channel.title: Offline...weird
channel.description:
OK to start off im not an idiot. I have been running a server for over a year and have absouloutly no problems with an online situation. Recently my server has gone off line. But there is no reason why. So heres what i have checked.
Port forwarding Port forwarded correctly, port 5555.
The port Again still there havent touched it. Number 5555
Run.bat It runs fine, nothing else coming up. It says Blazingrangerz Online.
No-ip. Yup blazingrangerz.no-ip.org Set up fine. No update or re-submits required.
Internet Connection. Obviously im set up to internet correctly. If im posting here.
Client.java Yup, blazingrangerz.no-ip.org And I havent touched anything like that recently.
Compiler. Compiles fine. No errors at all.
So heres what I think. The no-ip beilevs my computer is still in use.( being connected to) Because it hasn't expired. I have internet, and the port is set up. Either 1: My internet host (comcast) Screwed me over 2:No-ip is screwing me over. 3: IM skipping a step 4: Something I might have recently done to my computer affected ports.
So yea. I understand codes, so yes if theres something I need to know in codes. Hit me :D. And I did add a "Network Connection" For my Iphone so I can check on the server wherever. I tried reversing it back, but I couldent find the network editor, just the network adder.
Please help if you have any idea. There a lot of confused players, and I have no answer.
You can pm me on my forums Blazingrangerz.com

item.title: Offline...weird
item.dc:creator: @jbblaze jbblaze
item.description:
@jbblaze wrote:

Nope. All i have recently changed is I added a network, simply to connect from my phone. Ill double check everything right now. Im still a comcast customer. And I know comcast can be a pain in the butt sometimes. If you have any other Ideas, Id love to hear them

Read full topic

item.title: Offline...weird
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It’s your own judgment, to be honest. Have you switched routers? Have you changed internet providers? Etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Offline...weird
item.dc:creator: @jbblaze jbblaze
item.description:
@jbblaze wrote:

OK please read my whole post. This could plenty be a server problem.
I know how to port forward. I know the static Ip. It is configured. I will repeat again, I have had a online server for over a year. Please dont send me to basics, its something more.

Read full topic

item.title: Offline...weird
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

This section is for server help only, not hosting a server.

I’m pretty sure you haven’t correctly configured your static IP. Take a look at this page.
http://portforward.com/networking/static-xp.htm

Read full topic

item.title: Offline...weird
item.dc:creator: @jbblaze jbblaze
item.description:
@jbblaze wrote:

OK to start off im not an idiot. I have been running a server for over a year and have absouloutly no problems with an online situation. Recently my server has gone off line. But there is no reason why. So heres what i have checked.

Port forwarding
Port forwarded correctly, port 5555.

The port
Again still there havent touched it. Number 5555

Run.bat
It runs fine, nothing else coming up. It says Blazingrangerz Online.

No-ip.
Yup blazingrangerz.no-ip.org Set up fine. No update or re-submits required.

Internet Connection.
Obviously im set up to internet correctly. If im posting here.

Client.java
Yup, blazingrangerz.no-ip.org And I havent touched anything like that recently.

Compiler.
Compiles fine. No errors at all.

So heres what I think. The no-ip beilevs my computer is still in use.( being connected to) Because it hasn’t expired. I have internet, and the port is set up.
Either
1: My internet host (comcast) Screwed me over
2:No-ip is screwing me over.
3: IM skipping a step
4: Something I might have recently done to my computer affected ports.

So yea.
I understand codes, so yes if theres something I need to know in codes. Hit me :D.
And I did add a “Network Connection” For my Iphone so I can check on the server wherever. I tried reversing it back, but I couldent find the network editor, just the network adder.

Please help if you have any idea. There a lot of confused players, and I have no answer.
